title: Establishes a board of cooperative educational services school district restructuring committee
summary: Establishes a board of cooperative educational services school district restructuring committee to study and review the organization and operation of all component and non-component school districts within the area served by the board of cooperative educational services; outlines composition of such committee; requires a report be issued and recommendations be made.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to a board of cooperative educational services school district restructuring committee
